title: Bug 12906 - Unable to open a file in another editor if it is already opened in one editor
description: When a file is already opened in one editor in the Java Perspective, attempting to open the same file in another editor does not display any response.
OB:
1. Open the Java Perspective.
2. Double click on a java file to open it in the workbench.
3. Right click on the same java file and select 'Open With' > 'System Editor'.
4. No response is observed.
EB: There should be a warning message indicating that opening the file in another editor may result in overwriting changes, and prompting the user to confirm if they want to continue.
SR:
1. Close any opened java file in the workbench.
2. Open the Java Perspective.
3. Double click on a java file to open it in the workbench.
4. Right click on the same java file and select 'Open With' > 'System Editor'.
5. Verify that a warning message is displayed, informing the user about the potential for overwriting changes and giving an option to continue or cancel.
